Package BobcatLib.Subsystems.Intakes.Modules

Class IntakeModuleReal

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Subsystems.Intakes.Modules.IntakeModuleReal
public class IntakeModuleReal extends Object
Interface for the Intake Module as a real implementation. Defines methods to interact with and control the intake mechanism, including setting states, managing positions, and obtaining sensor data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    IntakeModuleReal(MotorIO rollerMotor, MotorIO pivotMotor, EncoderIO absEncoder, IntakeJson intakeJson)
    This implementation should be used with a pivoting intake where you have an absolute encoder attached to the pivot angle.
    IntakeModuleReal(MotorIO rollerMotor, MotorIO pivotMotor, IntakeJson intakeJson)
    This implementation should be used with a pivoting intake where you do not have an absolute encoder attached to the pivot angle.
    IntakeModuleReal(MotorIO rollerMotor, IntakeJson intakeJson)
    This implementation should be used when you have a static intake that never moves with a pivoting motor;

    • setVelocity

      public void setVelocity(double speedInMPS, double mechanismCircumference, boolean isOpen)
      Sets the velocity of the intake roller.
      Parameters:
      speedInMPS - The desired velocity in meters per second.
      mechanismCircumference - The circumference of the roller mechanism.
      isOpen - Whether the roller should be operating in open-loop mode.

    • holdPos

      public void holdPos(boolean stopRollers)
      Holds the pivot mechanism at a specific position.
      Parameters:
      stopRollers - The desired position in rotations.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops all movement of the intake mechanism.

    • getState

      public IntakeState getState()
      Gets the current state of the intake mechanism.
      Returns:
      The current state.

    • getPosition

      public Rotation2d getPosition()
      Gets the current pivot position of the intake mechanism.
      Returns:
      The current pivot angle as a Rotation2d object. Returns an empty Rotation2d if the intake does not use a pivot motor or the pivot motor is not equipped with an encoder.

    • getVelocity

      public double getVelocity()
      Gets the current velocity of the intake roller.
      Returns:
      The current velocity in meters per second.
